summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services. It details charges related to a shipment made on July 18, 2001, and includes information about duty and tax charges totaling $182.41.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for shipping services provided by FedEx.

persons.name: Thomas Balser
persons.context: Thomas Balser is mentioned as the sender associated with the shipment referenced in the invoice.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the client receiving services from Thomas Balser, who is associated with the shipment.

events.title: Shipment Date
events.description: A shipment was made by Jeffrey E. Epstein on this date, which is referenced in the invoice.

events.title: Delivery Date
events.description: The shipment was delivered on this date, as noted in the invoice.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 7, 2001, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
The total charges for the shipment amount to $182.41.
The shipment was made on July 18, 2001, and delivered on July 30, 2001.
Thomas Balser is associated with the shipment as the sender.
The invoice includes details about duty and tax charges related to the shipment.
